assign_product.editable: Allow buyer to edit product qty in the shopping cart
assign_product.removable: Allow buyer to remove product from the shopping cart

create_campaign.campaign_period: Time period that allows buyers to place an order
create_campaign.payment_record: Require buyer to attach payment record

campaign_list.instant_cart: Take-in orders without livestreaming post on social media
campaign_list.price_unit: Display a price unit on products, ie:  apply unit "K" for 10K instead of 10 dollars

manage_order.delivery_noti: Email buyer the order has been shipped

manage_order_details.price_adjustment: Adjust price that can add additional fee or give discount to buyer

auto_reply.assign_to: Assign auto reply to certain page

note.delivery_note: Additnonal message to inform buyers on certain details, such as store opening timings, delivery time period etc
note.special_note: A custom message to buyer, such as shopping note and T&C
note.confirm_note: Message to inform buyers of their order is confirmed

local.buyer_lang: Change local language for shopping cart, comments & messages

social.connect_social: Link your social media account to start your live-selling campaign
